page.title: 08Isley Walton
page.content: Isley Walton is a small farming community centred around the village church. It is situated close to the East Midlands Airport, Donington Park Racing Circuit and the M1 motorway. There are no amenities in the village and residents must travel to Melbourne, Breedon or Castle Donington for all their requirements. Two farms in Isley Walton, High Barn and Donington Park Farm offer traditional English Farmhouse Style bed and breakfast to visitors. Ease of access to the many historic sites in the East Midlands and to several large country houses, which are open to the public, is attracting increasing numbers of tourists to the area.
